12223111.content:
(Note: Link has an aadditional name here, because I felt that since Tetra/Zelda has one, Link deserves one too. Also, Link is a mute here)

A month had passed since you were rescued by your brother Aaron from the big, mean bird that had taken you away, and it looks like Aaron was finally coming home! You didn't get all that business with him being Link and Tetra being Zelda, but it didn't matter any more, because Aaron had finished his part, or something like that.

When Aaron came home, the first thing he did was to change into his blue sweater that grandma had knitted, and take a looong nap in his hammock. So everything was back to normal.

Well, almost everything.

After spending days caged in that mean birds prison, with nothing to eat or drink but that yucky water, you had developed a hunger that simply wouldn't go away. And you weren't putting on any weight: it was as if the food wasn't reaching your poor stomach, only passing through it.

Turns out, exactly that was happening. Your stomach had stopped digesting things, only your guts, and they weren't good alone.

Aaron also didn't know how to help you, though he did start cooking for you. He was a great cook, preparing meals with fish from all of the sea! They were delicious!

He tried some of the magic potions he had brought with him, but none of them helped, though they were tasty. He did however have more magical potions with him that he didn't give to you. The boring ones were only red and tasted like cherry, while others were vibrant with colors!

One day, when you were particularly hungry you were looking at the shelves when you found a weird potion. It was purple and had no name tag, and the description stated that it's powers are unknown.

Desparate as you were, you took out the bottle and drank it. It was strange, like drinking a rubbery goo, but it didn't taste bad. When you were finished, you still felt hungry, but you also felt... good.

You impulsivly fitted your fist into your mouth, as an experiment, and you're surprised you fitted your whole arm down there. You pulled it back up, and thought about your situation.

You could swallow anything, or... anyone. Desires you never knew you had started popping up in your head, but the most crszy one was to eat your brother. And yet... the more you thought about it, the more delicious it seemed. It actually made sense, since you wouldn't digest him, and you would be full!

Your mind is set, and you go to your brothers room. He would be wearing his regular pygama, but because it was hot, he had taken off his shirt. You decide to do it from the bottom up and take his feet into your mouth.

They taste well enough but you continue to swallow him up. You were just past his knees when his feet enter your stomach, but you continue. You reach his stomach, and take in both of his hands, when suddenly, he starts to stir. You hurry up now, speeding up all the way to his chest and sitting up, in order to eat him faster.

He wakes up, but looks down too late. His head was the last thing left outside of you. He wants to scream, but you shove the rest of his head Iinto your mouth. You could hear him panic inside of you, but you ignored this as the last of him enters your stomach. You feel really full, for the first time since weeks, and decide to make a nap on Aaron's bed.

When you wake up, Aaron had calmed down, but was still angry at you. You decide to...
12223111.title: Bro, get in ma belly!

122231111.content:
"You feel good in there Aaron, I think I'll keep you in there for now." You say. He reacts by punching your stomach walls in protest, which feels wonderful. You stand up, some how supporting your massive binge.

You go to the balcony, and look over the ocean. You enjoy your view, while Aaron slowly starts calming down.

Along the horizon, you see Tetra's ship sailing...
122231111.title: keep him in.

1222311111.content:
You look and see Tetra's ship heading to the port of the island. Grabbing the telescope, you watch as the ship docks and as Tetra started walking towards your home. You decide to head to your room and dress up for the occasion.

When Tetra walks in, she finds you in the living room, dressed up in a top, belly free shirt and a skirt. Tetra gasps when she sees you, and moans quietly:"Oh, Aryll, you look... amazing"! She exclaims, slowly walking towards you.

When Aaron heard Tetra's voice, he started pushing against you, making himself visible. Surprised, Tetra asks: "Is that... Aaron in there? " you clearly see that it was getting her turned on. "Oh, yes!" you answer with a big grin. Tetra reaches and touches your belly, starting to rub it. You l lean forward, and...
1222311111.title: ...in your direction.

1222311112.content:
You went into the kitchen and looked inside the food storage. It seemed like Aaron had prepared a lot of food, so you won't need to cook anything for weeks! Aaron was still showing around in your stomach, though apparently now for comfort rather than protest.

"Get comfortable in there, big brother, you'll be there for quite some time! " you say, while holding your massive binge with a smile. A muffled wail reaches your ears, but you ignore it.

(Note: Aaron will stay in her belly for at least the duration of the timeskip. He won't die, but he will slowly become inept to live outside the stomach. )

14223212.content:
Later that night, Saria went to bed late, unable to fully relax after the disappointment from earlier.

"Man," Saria moaned, "I thought I'd have a really big butt by now! I'd have had everyone ogling over me!"

About an hour later, Saria was finally asleep...and thus the transformation began. A heavenly light shined down on her butt, and once it was gone, her butt started to inflate...her cheeks grew wider and more jiggly as the night went on. The fabric of her skirt was stretching out, threatening to rip. The bottom of her butt cheeks started to poke out from her skirt, making even more distinguishable dimple lines.

The next morning...
14223212.title: Her butt grows overnight

142232122.content:
"Saria! Are you awake?"

Fado, the blonde-haired Kokiri girl, walked into Saria's abode wanting to get Saria up bright and early for their seemingly eternal days of peaceful bliss. Fado did not hear Saria stir, so she went over to see if she could get her up. She was instead greeted by a most unusual sight.

"Is that...what I think it is?"

She couldn't believe her eyes, but it was true. Saria's butt had grown overnight! If the fact that Saria's skirt was now ripped (thus exposing her butt crack) wasn't any indication, her dimpled butt flesh definitely was.

"Oh...my...goddess!" Fado exclaimed, "Her butt is HUGE!"

Fado's plans changed drastically at that moment, instead focusing on Saria's expanded bum...

1553221122.content:
It wasn't that Zelda didn't have a nice posterior. She knew she already had a nice round rump that she knew for a fact caught Link's attention several times. It just didn't seem to be enough to keep his attention completely on her, instead of shacking up with the Zora princess Mipha. And she knew even if she ate a king's ransom in food, it would not only not go down to her butt...it wouldn't even stay on her long to begin with, her physical training for the battle against Calamity Ganon almost guaranteed she would not put on weight.

At least not through natural means.

"I've heard there are ways to undergo physical transformations," Zelda said, "Perhaps it would be a worthwhile journey to meet them and ask for better...assetts..."

In the dead of night, Zelda rode out to find someone to grant her wish of having a bigger butt, but she may end up getting more than she bargained for...

info.description:
Do whatever you want as long as you follow the rules

1. no sex (unless its off screen)
2. no killing off characters
3. the point of the story must have someone getting expanded in some way
4. no Yaoi. Yuri however is fine
5. no ridiculous gains. keep it at least somewhat realistic.
6. have fun
